comments.text:
Frank, there may be a couple more app ids that I have for this application:

`org-mozilla-ios-FirefoxBeta`
`org-mozilla-ios-FennecEnterprise`
`org-mozilla-ios-Firefox`

I'm currently trying to determine the significance of each of them and if they all need to be added, but I'm still waiting on responses.   I'm hoping that these aren't used but I found them in the application and I wanted to double check before I dismissed them.
